name: Movement System Demo
description:
This definitely doesn't qualify as a game, but I got nothing else this week.

I scrapped and rewrote the movement/collision system to utilize more of Unity's core 2D physics. It's still got some rough edges but it's a vast improvement over the old model.

Come by next week for more mouse.

CONTROLS

[Z / ENTER / Gamepad Button South] - Confirm

[X / SHIFT / Gamepad Button East] - Cancel

[Z / ENTER / Gamepad Button West] - Interact

[X / SHIFT / Gamepad Button South] - Jump

[C / ESCAPE / Gamepad Button Start] - Menu

[Arrow Keys / Stick] - Move [F4] - Fullscreen
